<a id="VisualShaderNodeParameter"></a>

# VisualShaderNodeParameter

**Inherits:** [VisualShaderNode](VisualShaderNode.md) **\<** [Resource](Resource.md) **\<** [RefCounted](RefCounted.md) **\<** [Object](Object.md)

**Inherited By:** [VisualShaderNodeBooleanParameter](VisualShaderNodeBooleanParameter.md), [VisualShaderNodeColorParameter](VisualShaderNodeColorParameter.md), [VisualShaderNodeFloatParameter](VisualShaderNodeFloatParameter.md), [VisualShaderNodeIntParameter](VisualShaderNodeIntParameter.md), [VisualShaderNodeTextureParameter](VisualShaderNodeTextureParameter.md), [VisualShaderNodeTransformParameter](VisualShaderNodeTransformParameter.md), [VisualShaderNodeUIntParameter](VisualShaderNodeUIntParameter.md), [VisualShaderNodeVec2Parameter](VisualShaderNodeVec2Parameter.md), [VisualShaderNodeVec3Parameter](VisualShaderNodeVec3Parameter.md), [VisualShaderNodeVec4Parameter](VisualShaderNodeVec4Parameter.md)

A base type for the parameters within the visual shader graph.

<!-- classref-introduction-group -->

## Description

A parameter represents a variable in the shader which is set externally, i.e. from the [ShaderMaterial](ShaderMaterial.md). Parameters are exposed as properties in the [ShaderMaterial](ShaderMaterial.md) and can be assigned from the Inspector or from a script.

<!-- classref-reftable-group -->

## Enumerations

<a id="enum_VisualShaderNodeParameter_Qualifier"></a>

<!-- classref-enumeration -->

enum **Qualifier**: [ðŸ”—](#enum_VisualShaderNodeParameter_Qualifier)

<a id="VisualShaderNodeParameter_constant_QUAL_NONE"></a>

<!-- classref-enumeration-constant -->

[Qualifier](VisualShaderNodeParameter.md#enum_VisualShaderNodeParameter_Qualifier) **QUAL_NONE** = `0`

The parameter will be tied to the [ShaderMaterial](ShaderMaterial.md) using this shader.<a id="VisualShaderNodeParameter_constant_QUAL_GLOBAL"></a>

<!-- classref-enumeration-constant -->

[Qualifier](VisualShaderNodeParameter.md#enum_VisualShaderNodeParameter_Qualifier) **QUAL_GLOBAL** = `1`

The parameter will use a global value, defined in Project Settings.<a id="VisualShaderNodeParameter_constant_QUAL_INSTANCE"></a>

<!-- classref-enumeration-constant -->

[Qualifier](VisualShaderNodeParameter.md#enum_VisualShaderNodeParameter_Qualifier) **QUAL_INSTANCE** = `2`

The parameter will be tied to the node with attached [ShaderMaterial](ShaderMaterial.md) using this shader.<a id="VisualShaderNodeParameter_constant_QUAL_MAX"></a>

<!-- classref-enumeration-constant -->

[Qualifier](VisualShaderNodeParameter.md#enum_VisualShaderNodeParameter_Qualifier) **QUAL_MAX** = `3`

Represents the size of the [Qualifier](VisualShaderNodeParameter.md#enum_VisualShaderNodeParameter_Qualifier) enum.<hr class="classref-section-separator"/>
